name: And Then There Were None (AnnaMisko)
description:
'And Then There Were None' is a text adventure game based on the novel of the same title by Agatha Christie.

'And Then There Were None' is a choice-and-consequence game that makes you choose different actions and dialogue options. Your choices are vital and will determine how you proceed through the game and what results will you accomplish when you finish it.

You can choose one of the 7 playable characters:

  1. Vera Claythorne. An attractive young lady, a former governess who now works as a secretary.
  2. Philip Lombard. A soldier of fortune, world traveler, and former military man who had served in Africa.
  3. Emily Brent. A rigid spinsterw of harsh moralistic principles who uses the Bible to justify her inability to show compassion or understanding for others.
  4. General John Gordon Macarthur. A retired World War I hero and an oldest person among the characters of the story.
  5. Dr. Edward Armstrong. A fussy middle-aged doctor. Gave up surgery to specialize in treating people with nervous disorders.
  6. Anthony Marston. A rich, spoiled, athletic young man who loves to drive too fast and appears to lack a conscience.
  7. William Henry Blore. A retired police inspector turned private investigator.

Text by Agatha Christie

Design by Anna Misko

Music by Ivan Abramov

Art by Veronica Sereda

Contact info: annkubrick@yandex.ru (Anna Misko)

Игра «And Then There Were None» разработана в рамках работы над магистерской диссертацией студентки факультета иностранных языков и регионоведения МГУ имени Ломоносова, Мисько Анны, по теме «Текстовый квест в преподавании англоязычной литературы».

Контактная информация:

Мисько Анна

Московский государственный университет имени М.В. Ломоносова, факультет иностранных языков и регионоведения;

Магистратура, 2 курс, кафедра теории преподавания иностранных языков.
